amendment.description: To provide coverage for kidney disease education services under the medicare program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1067 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1067 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S8644, S8647) To provide coverage for kidney disease education services under the medicare program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1067 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Lincoln.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1067 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
